content: The **Second Goh Chok Tong Cabinet** was formed after the [1991 Singaporean general election](/wiki/1991_Singaporean_general_election) and dissolved for the [1997 Singaporean general election](/wiki/1997_Singaporean_general_election). The new Cabinet was formed due to Prime Minister, [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong), calling a snap election, seeking a strong and fresh mandate after succeeding [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) as prime minister. ## Cabinet The Second Goh Chok Tong Cabinet is composed of the following members.
